thread.title: European shares suffer biggest weekly fall this year
thread.title_full: European shares suffer biggest weekly fall this year

author: Tara Cunningham
title: European shares suffer biggest weekly fall this year
text: Market Report European shares suffer biggest weekly fall this year European shares are braced for the biggest weekly fall of the year as fears over the health of China's economy intensify. Photo: Alamy By Tara Cunningham , Business Reporter 9:16AM BST 21 Aug 2015
